mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE VALUES(#{code}, SEQ_DSC.NEXTVAL, #{title}, TO_DATE(#{sDate}), TO_DATE(#{eDate}), DEFAULT, #{mCode} )
mapper.select:
SELECT SC.SC_CODE, SC.DSC_NO, SC.SC_TITLE, SC.SC_SDATE, SC.SC_EDATE, SC.SC_STATUS, M.M_CODE, M.M_NAME FROM SCHEDULE SC, MEMBER M WHERE SC.M_CODE= M.M_CODE AND SC.SC_STATUS='N' AND SC_SDATE >= TO_DATE(#{sDate}) AND SC_EDATE <= TO_DATE(#{eDate}) AND M.DEPT_NO= TO_NUMBER(#{deptNo}) AND SC.SC_CODE='1'
UNION ALL
SELECT SC.SC_CODE, SC.DSC_NO, SC.SC_TITLE, SC.SC_SDATE, SC.SC_EDATE, SC.SC_STATUS, M.M_CODE, M.M_NAME FROM SCHEDULE SC, MEMBER M WHERE SC.M_CODE= M.M_CODE AND SC.SC_STATUS='N' AND SC_SDATE >= TO_DATE(#{sDate}) AND SC_EDATE <= TO_DATE(#{eDate}) AND SC.M_CODE=#{mcode} AND SC.SC_CODE='2'
